'''Bag of Flower Seeds''' is a Quest Item that can be obtained from opening one of [[Takashi]]'s chests for the second time. Giving this item to [[Hanayama Kaoru]] will spawn a chest rewarding the player with 20,000 [[Mora]].

==Dialogue==
Upon obtaining the item, Paimon has the following dialogue:
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Paimon:''' What's this? Looks like a huge bag of flower seeds, but what type of flower is it? ...Well, finders keepers.
{{Dialogue end}}
